text: Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Nia ulu mmaadua dama daane o digau Israel la digau ni aagu. Hihia nia ingoo o nia ulu mmaadua dama daane o digau Israel huogodoo, go digau ala e dagi dahi nadau malama be e mada mmaadua. Digau Levi huogodoo ala e pono nadau lohongo la nia daangada ni aagu. Au go Dimaadua! Au e hai mee labelaa gi nia ulu mmaadua o nia manu dolodolo o digau Levi huogodoo e pono di lohongo o nia ulu mmaadua o nia manu dolodolo o digau Israel.”
